languages.text: "Я вижу эмоции людей в пестрых оттенках, что окружают их естество, Лорд-капитан. И все понимаю. Однако же мне пришлась по нраву эта игра. Надеюсь... и вам тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Я вижу эмоции людей в пестрых оттенках, что окружают их естество, Лорд-капитан. И все понимаю. Однако же мне пришлась по нраву эта игра. Надеюсь... и вам тоже".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."
languages.original_text: "Я вижу эмоции людей в пестрых оттенках, что окружают их естество, Лорд-капитан. И все понимаю. Однако же мне пришлась по нраву эта игра. Надеюсь... и вам тоже".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Veo las emociones ajenas en el vívido espectro de colores que envuelve su esencia, Lord Capitán. Y lo percibo todo. Aun así, he disfrutado de nuestro jueguecito. Espero... que usted también lo haya hecho».
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: «Veo las emociones ajenas en el vívido espectro de colores que envuelve su esencia, Lord Capitán. Y lo percibo todo. Aun así, he disfrutado de nuestro jueguecito. Espero... que usted también lo haya hecho».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は人々の感情を、その本質を取り巻く鮮やかな色彩として見ることができます、ロード・キャプテン。なので、すべて理解できます。それでも、このちょっとした駆け引きを楽しませてもらいました。あなたも楽しんでいただけていたら…幸いです」
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: 「私は人々の感情を、その本質を取り巻く鮮やかな色彩として見ることができます、ロード・キャプテン。なので、すべて理解できます。それでも、このちょっとした駆け引きを楽しませてもらいました。あなたも楽しんでいただけていたら…幸いです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我可以通过人类本质周围的色彩洞察到他们的情绪，舰长大人。我什么都知道，但我还是很享受这场小小的游戏，我希望……你也会喜欢。”
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: “我可以通过人类本质周围的色彩洞察到他们的情绪，舰长大人。我什么都知道，但我还是很享受这场小小的游戏，我希望……你也会喜欢。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je perçois les émotions d'autrui sous la forme de couleurs entourant leur essence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je comprends tout. J'ai cependant apprécié ce petit jeu. J'espère... qu'il en va de même pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: « Je perçois les émotions d'autrui sous la forme de couleurs entourant leur essence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je comprends tout. J'ai cependant apprécié ce petit jeu. J'espère... qu'il en va de même pour vous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe die Emotionen anderer im bunten Spektrum der Farben, die ihre Essenz umgeben, Lord Captain. Und ich verstehe alles. Doch dieses kleine Spiel hat mir Spaß gemacht. Euch ... hoffentlich auch."
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe die Emotionen anderer im bunten Spektrum der Farben, die ihre Essenz umgeben, Lord Captain. Und ich verstehe alles. Doch dieses kleine Spiel hat mir Spaß gemacht. Euch ... hoffentlich auch."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

languages.text: "İnsanların özlerini saran berrak renk yelpazesinde hissettikleri duyguları görebiliyorum Lord Kaptan. Her şeyi de anlayabiliyorum. Yine de bu küçük oyundan keyif aldım. Umarım... Sen de keyif almışsındır."
languages.original_text: "I see people's emotions in the vivid spectrum of hues surrounding their essence, Lord Captain. And I understand everything. However, I have enjoyed this little game. I hope... you have too."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanların özlerini saran berrak renk tonu yelpazesinde hissettikleri duyguları görebiliyorum Lord Kaptan. Her şeyi de anlayabiliyorum. Yine de bu küçük oyundan keyif aldım. Umarım... Sen de keyif almışsındır."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
